title: Noah Centineo confirms relationship with Alexis Ren at the UNICEF Ball
text:
They were first rumored to be a couple last month, but have neither confirmed nor shared photos of the two of them together.

But things have changed for Noah Centineo and girlfriend Alexis Ren, who appeared to confirm their romance on Saturday.

The To All the Boys I've Loved Before star cuddled up to the social media starlet while on the red carpet at the UNICEF Masquerade Ball.

It's official: Noah Centineo, 23, confirmed his rumored relationship with girlfriend Alexis Ren, 22, at the UNICEF Masquerade Ball in LA on Saturday

Noah looked trendy in a striped button-down layered underneath a black blazer and paired with tapered trousers.

The 23-year-old dressed down his look with a pair of sneakers and a set of sunglasses on his head.

Alexis, 22, was styled in a metallic halter dress and prism pumps.

True love: The To All the Boys I've Loved Before star cuddled up to the social media starlet while on the red carpet

Keeping quiet at first: They were first rumored to be a couple last month, but have neither confirmed nor shared photos of the two of them together

Rumors that Noah and Alexis were dating began swirling last month.

According to Us Weekly, the Miami native was seen picking her up at a Palm Beach airport in May.

'He picked her up as she was on my flight. He was waiting for her at baggage claim,' a source began to the site. 'He kissed her on the head, [and] they were holding hands and hugging.'

'[It was] very clear that they were together,' the source added.

Trendy: Noah looked trendy in a striped button-down layered underneath a black blazer and paired with tapered trousers

Noah starred as Jesus Adams in the Fosters, and played Camila Cabello's love interest in her Havana music video.

The handsome actor shot to mega-stardom in his breakout role as Peter in To All the Boys I Loved Before. He is set to star in two more films in the franchise.

In addition to those films, he'll also appear in Charlie's Angeles, The Diary, and Masters of the Universe.
description: They were first rumored to be a couple last month, but have neither confirmed nor shared photos of the two of themselves together. But things changed on Saturday night.
